content: this knit baby blanket is worked in panels and joined together using the mattress stitch for an invisible seam in finishing stitched in cuddly bernat softee baby each stocking stitch panel uses simple increases and decreases to create a chevron pattern that s enhanced with cheerful colorblocking this easier-than-it-looks masterpiece is perfect for practicing knit 2 together decrease slip slip knit decrease make 1 left and make 1 right increases plus knit and purl techniques
